title: Vegane Waren Lena Faber
description: A small sale from stock located nearby Lindau/Bodensee in the industrial park Edelweiss. Offers 100% vegan foods, super foods, t-shirts, sweets, books, animal nutrition, drugs and supplements and many more. Does not carry frozen or refrigerated goods. The owner, Lena Faber, and her assistant are compassionate vegans, animal rights activists and both have longtime experience in running a business.
